section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO, however the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go.
explanation: The contract states the business name will be BM&V2GO, but the partnership name will be Vaccines2Go. This creates confusion as to what the actual name of the joint venture is. It is an in-text contradiction.

section: Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: There is ambiguity in the text regarding the exact duties and contributions of each member. The description for BorrowMoney.com, inc. includes technical duties but lacks a clear monetary value or commitment. The description for JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go includes a monetary contribution but also mentions "Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue," which is vague. It is not clear if the 10% is in addition to or part of the $60,000.

section: Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The agreed value for BorrowMoney.com, inc's contribution (1,500 sq ft of leased space and specified duties) is valued at $3,500.00 USD. However, JVLS, LLC's contribution is listed as '$60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Addition to The Total Contributions' but is valued at $3,500,000.00 USD. There is no clear indication as to how the $60,000 plus a percentage translates into $3,500,000.00. This is an in-text contradiction.
